project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that will enable customers to securely access onboarding resources, track their progress, and view usage data for the main SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in to the COSP using their existing SaaS product credentials
Session management and logout functionality work as expected
No security vulnerabilities identified in the authentication process

feature_breakdown.description: Display an onboarding checklist tailored to the customer's subscription level (Tier 1, Tier 2, etc.).
dependencies: Integration with CRM for subscription data
technical_requirements: Dynamic content rendering based on subscription data
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding checklists are displayed correctly based on the customer's subscription level
Users can mark tasks as complete and see their progress
Checklist content is easily maintainable by the product team

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate the COSP with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search and browse the knowledge base content within the COSP
Search results are relevant and comprehensive
Content is displayed in a user-friendly manner

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays relevant and accurate usage metrics
Metrics are presented in a clear and intuitive manner
Dashboard is responsive and works well on both desktop and mobile devices

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
dependencies: Integration with Zendesk or email provider
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily initiate a support request from the COSP
Support request includes relevant customer information
Support request is successfully created in the target system (Zendesk or email)

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests are handled by the API server, which retrieves data from the database, caches, and third-party integrations, and renders the appropriate UI components in the web application.
security_considerations: Secure authentication and authorization using OAuth 2.0 or SAML
Encryption of data at rest and in transit (TLS 1.2+)
Role-based access control for sensitive data

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including secure login, personalized onboarding checklists, and knowledge base integration.
deliverables: Integration with identity provider, CRM, and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Implement additional features to improve customer success and self-service capabilities.
deliverables: Usability enhancements based on user feedback

risk_analysis.description: Delays in integrating with third-party systems (identity provider, CRM, knowledge base, etc.)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with integration partners early, establish clear communication and escalation channels, and allocate sufficient time for integration testing.

risk_analysis.description: Underestimating the complexity of the usage data visualization feature
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct thorough technical research, prototype key components, and build in sufficient buffer time for this feature.

risk_analysis.description: Inability to meet the 6-month timeline for the MVP release
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features based on business value, continuously monitor progress, and be prepared to make scope adjustments if necessary.

infrastructure_needs: AWS EC2 instances for web and API servers
AWS Elasticsearch Service for search indexing

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
